gate.alignment
Interface AlignmentListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinksView, MatrixView, ParallelTextView
public interface AlignmentListener

Object wishing to listen to alignment events should implement this interface and register itself to the appropriate alignment object.

Author:
niraj

Method Summary

          This method is invoked whenever two annotations are aligned with each other.

                        String srcAS,
                        Document srcDocument,

Parameters:

srcAS - - annotation set the source annotation belongs to

targetAnnotation -
tgtAS - - annotation set the target annotation belongs to
